message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product for a limited time. It's a unique opportunity to acquire a truly exceptional item. I'm willing to let it go for $15000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I am only able to consider offers within my budget. Would you be willing to negotiate down to $14000?

I understand you're working with a budget, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm covering my costs. I can offer the product to you for $14500. This is the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a great value for the quality and uniqueness of the item.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the product's features and my budget constraints, I would like to propose an offer of $14200.

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $14350. This is the best price I can do, and I think it's still a great deal for you.
I'm grateful for your continued flexibility, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose an offer of $14300 for the product.
